category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_show_family_namespace_prefix
preference.preference_description: Controls the visibility of the family namespace in formula strings of variant expressions in the Cfg0configurator template. The preference is used in the SOA operation ConfiguratorManagement::getVariantExpressionDisplayStrings and for the display value for property "cfg0SubjectCondition" on business objects deriving from "Cfg0AbsRule". The Valid Values: - false: Hides the family namespace for the Family, e.g. "Family = feature". - true: Displays the family namespace for the Family, e.g. "[Namespace]Family = feature". This is the default value.
